entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to rain overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to flurries at times heavy in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy changing to light snow in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
